title: Linear Regression with CPP
description: uncover working of linear regression by implementing the algorithm in a low-level language like c++. Learn the algorithm, its working principle, derivatives involved in implementation and visualising result with imgui and implot.

title: Templates | Nix Flake
description: Templates is wonderful feature of nix-flakes, that make spining up new project easy. In this blog I am going breif about how I use them in my workflow, and teach you how to use it.
